short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds titles to pages linked from reddit that don't have titles (e.g. images)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds titles to pages linked from reddit that don't have titles (e.g. images). So, if you click a link, then forget why you clicked it, maybe this will remind you.
